{{{
		// PATCH CAPTCHA
		if ( JPluginHelper::isEnabled( 'system', 'captcha' ) ) {
			$captchacode = strtolower( JRequest::getVar( 'captchacode', '', 'post' ) );
			$results = JDispatcher::getInstance()->trigger( 'onCaptchaVerify', array( $captchacode ) );
			if ( ! $results[0] ) { 			
				JError::raiseWarning( 'CAPTHCA', JText::_( 'SECURECODE_DO_NOT_MATCH' ).JText::_($captchacode) ); // 
				$this->register();
				return false;
			}
		}
